raw_text: It is well-known that disjunctive unification is NPcomplete (Kasper 1987)
clean_text: It is well-known that disjunctive unification is NP complete (Kasper 1987).

raw_text: The unification of disjunctive feature structures is implemented according to Kasper ' s algorithm (Kasper, 1987)
clean_text: The unification of disjunctive feature structures is implemented according to Kasper's algorithm (Kasper, 1987).

raw_text: The general problem of unifying two disjunctive feature structures is non-polynomial in the number of disjunctions (Kasper, 1987)
clean_text: The general problem of unifying two disjunctive feature structures is non-polynomial in the number of disjunctions (Kasper, 1987).

clean_text: There is reason to hope that this will often be the case; while disjunction may be widespread in grammar ules and texical entries, Kasper (1987) observes that in his implementation "in the analysis of a particular sentence most features have a unique value, and some features are not present at, all".

clean_text: Kasper (1987) describes a technique which, for every set of n conjoined disjunctions, checks the consistency first of single disjuncts against the definite part of the description, then that of pairs and so on up ton-tuples for full consistency.

clean_text: This variation of the algorithm given in Kasper (1987) is closer to Propane's strategy, but the expansion to full DNF is itself in general an exponential process and will, when many disjunctions remain, be far more expensive than looking for a single realization.

raw_text: Unification time here is order n lo, q n in the sizes n of the input structures (Kasper, 1987)
clean_text: Unification time here is order n log n in the sizes n of the input structures (Kasper, 1987).

raw_text: Kasper (1987) and Eisele and DSrre (1988) have tackled this problem and proposed unification methods for disjunctive feature descriptions
clean_text: Kasper (1987) and Eisele and DSrre (1988) have tackled this problem and proposed unification methods for disjunctive feature descriptions.
